Here is how the query/target pairs were designed:
```
----------GAGTAAGCCGAAGGTGGAAAGTGCCCACGCTTGCTGGCACTACACCCAAAAAAAGGGGATGTCGGGCAGGTTGGCGGAACACGCAAGAAA
                                                                                                                            X                                                                                      X                                                                               X                                                                                                                                                                            XXXXX                                                                                                                                   XXXXXXXXXX                                                                                         |
-----CTGACCGCGCTGGGCGAATGAATTACGATTTTGTCCTGTTGACGCTCCGGCCGCTACGTTTGCAGAACTATAACGACGCCCAACCTGCCTGATGTGCAGCAGAAGCAAGTAACTCCAAAGGGCCCCTGAAAGTCGCGTTTGGAGTAAGCCGAAGGTGGAAAGTGCCCACGCTTGCTGGCACTACACCCAAAAAAAGGGGATGTCGGGCAGGTTGGCGGAACACGCAAGAAA
                                                                                                                            R:C->G                                                                                 R:T->A                                                                          Q:C->T                                                                                                                                                                       R:5I                                                                                                                                    Q:10D
```

The following is the set of inputs and outputs as per the graph above. The target sequence and all variants will be stored in the same variants.gfa2 file, which is supposed to be read as both the reference and the graph.

```
>query1

>ref1



H	VN:Z:2.0
S	ref1	695	
S	snp1	1	C
S	snp2	1	T
S	snp3	1	T
S	sv2	10	GTCGCGTTTG
E	E1-in	ref1+	snp1+	123	123	0	0	*
E	E1-out	snp1+	ref1+	1$	1$	125	125	*
E	E2-in	ref1+	snp2+	210	210	0	0	*
E	E2-out	snp2+	ref1+	1$	1$	212	212	*
E	E3-in	ref1+	snp3+	290	290	0	0	*
E	E3-out	snp3+	ref1+	1$	1$	292	292	*
E	E4-sv1	ref1+	ref1+	463	463	469	469	*
E	E5-in	ref1+	sv2+	594	594	0	0	*
E	E5-out	sv2+	ref1+	10$	10$	606	606	*
```
